title: LolClient has stopped working
body: I'm running windows 10 and for some reason my client starts to freeze and just say "lolclient.exe has stopped working". This just started happening like 1-3 weeks ago. This is a year old gaming pc and everything is up to date. I've probably lost 30 lp worth of dodges because of this bug.

replies.body:
I've been hearing a lot lately that the Windows 10 Anniversary updates have been causing random crashes for a fair amount of players. I recommend [uninstalling or rolling back](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) those updates to see if anything changes.

Let me know if this helped.
